title: 【PVP/小游戏】FLIGHT WARFARE|飞行战争|1.11.2|多人联机|TEAM LAZULI
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-9 21:24 编辑 

简介 InfoFlight Warfare is a vanilla Minecraft CTF mini-game where you glide down to the center to capture the flag while getting chased by your enemies. But try to stay alive!Use any means to survive.A combination of: Elytras, PVP & CTF.If you run it on a server make sure you have command blocks enabled. To join teams right click the sign at spawn and step onto the pressure plate when you get teleported to proceed into the game.飞行战争是一个原版MC的CTF小游戏地图，你可以在靠近对手的同时滑翔到中间并获得旗帜，试着活下来！使用任何东西，只要能活下来这是一个鞘翅+PVP+CTF的结合如果你运行服务器记得让命令方块有权限使用。如果要加入队伍请邮件木牌然后踩踏板来继续游戏。
特征 FeaturesMax Players: 2-42 Unique Weapons to Fight off The EnemiesShearsGamemode 2Nice built lobbyCompetitive

玩家：2-42个独特的武器剪刀冒险模式漂亮的大厅建筑有竞争

图片 Pictures





下载 Downlaod国内云盘：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1miG39bE原贴：http://www.minecraftmaps.com/pvp-maps/flight-warfare
